sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { }

Welcome to the Angular demo.

This demo includes the following features:

  • ASP.NET Core and C# for cross-platform server-side code
  • Angular and TypeScript for client-side code
  • Bootstrap for layout and styling
  • Client-side navigation.


   Some icons provided via the Bootstrap Icons collection.
    Bootstrap Icons are under the MIT license.
   Some icons in this collection have been modified.

Learn about building Web apps with ASP.NET Core.

The ClientApp subdirectory is a standard Angular CLI application. If you open a command prompt in that directory, you can run any ng command (e.g., ng test), or use npm to install extra packages into it.
